description.value:
Potion, common
For 1 hour after you drink this potion, you can move across icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check, and difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesnâ€™t cost you extra movement. This sparkling blue liquid contains tiny snowflakes that disappear when shaken.
